name: Love Live! School Idol Festival Cards
description:
This LORA aims to replicate the style and layout of Love Live! School Idol Festival Cards and it does so quite well I think.

It's trained on ~3500 card-like images in 512x720 format for 8 epochs.

All example images are made with Anything V3.0.

The trigger word is LLCard
Additionally you should use one of the rarities together with their detail level:

  • N rarity, simple background

  • R rarity, simple background

  • SR rarity, simple background

  • SSR rarity, detailed background

  • UR rarity, detailed background

And lastly use one of the color attributes:

  • pink attribute

  • blue attribute

  • green attribute

Using the name of one of the main cast's girls also replicates them quite well.

This is my first lora so feedback and tips are much appreciated :D

Some issues I am aware of:

  • Smaller CFG Scale creates fancier outfits while bigger CFG creates simpler designs

  • It seems to struggle with hands especially with smaller CFG values

  • The color of the attribute often seems to bleed into eye, hair and clothes colors

  • The small symbol on the bottom right often only shows up after Hires. fixing

  • The names are never readable

modelVersions.name: v1.0
modelVersions.description:
First version.
Trigger words:

  • LLCard

  • one of:

    • N rarity, simple background

    • R rarity, simple background

    • SR rarity, simple background

    • SSR rarity, detailed background

    • UR rarity, detailed background

  • one of:

    • pink attribute

    • blue attribute

    • green attribute
